channel.title: Inspiration on Apokatastasis
channel.description: Recent content in Inspiration on Apokatastasis

item.title: God is Breathing and So Are You
item.description: I do not mean to start this post aggressively but thoughtfully. I want to confront head on what the commonly accepted notions of inspiration mean for us today. I want to press into the questions that trouble a lot of people and to bring those into focus. I want to bring those notions and assumption into the light and question them. And I want to suggest an alternative lens for understanding inspiration
